website_summaries.verdict: With a little help from JBL, the LG Tone Ultra wireless stereo headset gets a design and sound quality upgrade -- along with an unwelcome price bump.
pros: The LG Tone Ultra HBS-800 is a Bluetooth stereo headset that improves on the design of the previous Tone models and is comfortable to wear
It also offers better sound (more bass, better clarity) and decent battery life, particularly when you turn the noise-canceling off
cons: Expensive compared with previous LG Tone stereo headsets
noise-canceling feature didn't seem to make a difference

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Quality !!!
customer_reviews.text: Although this says it is LG, I don't believe it is. Has to be a knock off. Looks authentic however I was replacing an failed HBS800 headset I bought from Verizon. This new unit sounds different, buttons feel different and cheaper, caller states the sound clarity is terrible compared to me other one. I would not recommend purchasing one of these units. I was very happy with the old unit I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: MBaker

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE RANGE renders product unusable and NO SUPPORT or recall from LG
customer_reviews.text: 1) HBS-800 has terrible range (minus 3 stars). Callers cannot hear me once I put my phone in my pocket. Phone disconnects completely when I am 20 feet away. 2) LG is not owning up to this issue and provided no support if I cannot find my receipt or the receipt shows a purchase date older than 12 months. This issue is real and people all over Amazon and other review sites (CNET, Youtube, etc) are complaining about it yet LG is not recalling or supporting anyone outside of warranty or without receipt. Any bluetooth headset should work when your phone is in your pocket (minus 1 more stars for bad support of an inferior product)
customer_reviews.author: Slugger

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had the headset for about a week it was working fine the noise cancelling was working and I was happy with the headset then all of a sudden today it would not come on. When you charge it the red light comes on to let you know that it's charging but when I tried to hit the on switch it just would not respond so I returned it. I think I'm going to reorder the hbs-750 had that has set for 4 years and the left earpiece went out recently that's why I ordered the hbs-800.
customer_reviews.author: R. watson

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for women.  Here's why:
customer_reviews.text: If you are a woman, chances are good that you are wearing a tank top (not a T-shirt) when you work out. If so, the sweat goes directly into the seam of the piece that rests on your collarbone and it fries the headset. It is an extremely poor design and I can't help but wonder if they only used men to product test these things. And that makes me angry. These headphones are absolutely useless if you sweat while you work out. I am on my third pair -- all various versions of this LG HBS-800 product, and all of them have fizzled out 10 or 15 minutes into the workout. Time to switch to something better.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderinglight

customer_reviews.title: Average 1 Year Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I like these headsets so much that I have bought two of them. HOWEVER, the reason I bought the second one was because the right speaker went out on the first one after about a year. Now, a year after the second purchase, the right speaker has gone out on this one as well...I guess I just have to accept the fact that electronics are not designed to last so we can keep filling up the landfills and keep all of these companies in business!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I found the HBS-800 comfortable to wear and to have excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I found the HBS-800 comfortable to wear and to have excellent sound quality. It functions very well for Bluetooth phone calls. The control buttons however have serious quality issues for outdoor use during strenuous exercise or work. Basically the unit is very susceptible any moisture or high humidity. On my unit, the call answer button was the first to malfunction after wearing it while mowing the lawn. I sent the unit back to the factory for warranty repair. Next I wore the unit to the gym and experienced another similar malfunction. I wouldn't recommend this model for other than wearing indoors in the home, car, or office environment.
customer_reviews.author: Richard of FL

customer_reviews.title: LG Tone Ultra arrived in a very nicely packaged box with a clear full size image of ...
customer_reviews.text: LG Tone Ultra arrived in a very nicely packaged box with a clear full size image of the headset on the front and detailed functional description with specifications and additional features on the back. I actually did appreciate the functional description since it served a purpose of a quick start guide.The wire locations do appear to be a much better design. The things that were good about the HBS-800 a slightly more appealing design, the blinking light that indicates the device is powered on is smaller and in a different location, and that the wires that connect to the earpiece didn't coil and tangle.
customer_reviews.author: marian lawson

customer_reviews.title: Ok, until the warranty is up, then, it dies.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked okay; the sound quality was good, but everyone told me I sounded like I was in a tunnel when using them to make phone calls. Battery died 12.5 months after purchase and will no longer accept a charge. This just happens to be two weeks outside of the warranty period. Frowny face.
customer_reviews.author: WadeTMC

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are totally worthless. The earbuds are too big, so big they don’t even fit back into the collar. I turn them off for the night with a full charge and they have no charge in the morning. The design is uncomfortable and the USB port has the cover so tight it’s difficult to push the plug in. I have used the LG 750 twice in the past and they were exceptional. They lasted two years each time and I used them everyday all day until they wore out. Couldn’t be happier with the sound, fit, working out. I don’t know why they replaced the 750 with such an inferior product. I can’t even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Flalinda

customer_reviews.title: Read through the update.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones until they stopped working at about 2 months. I returned them for repair, and they were returned to me unrepaired with no explaination. Would have given them a 5 star rating, but $50 bucks for 2 months doesn't even deserve the 1star I did give them. I own 4 lg tvs, and this was my second pair of lg headphones. But with this example of customer loyalty satisfaction, I will be rethinking my future purchases. Update: I returned the headset a second time and LG upgraded my hbs 800 white with a pair of hbs 810 black. My faith in LG is restored, and so is the "5" star rating. Thanks LG.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't go anywhere without them
customer_reviews.text: I had my first pair for 2 years! I wore them to the gym every day drenched in sweat. I loved it so much I bought another pair. My buddy has a lot of issues with the newer model with the retractable ear buds. So as long as they have these I'll keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good upgrade...
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of the LG tones for awhile, all had good features, performance , etc. Previous model for me was the "730". I skipped the pro and went to the ultra model. Pros Better sound I guess? I don't notice too much of a difference. Ergonomics are better, curved design fits better. No obnoxious blue blinking light. Cons Range is easily half of older models, cuts out or disconnects very easily. The buttons are on the sides, very small and very hard to manipulate. Bottom line is save your money and get the older model.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, works well, sound quality is very good, controls are easy to manage. My husband and I both have one now. The only drawback we've found so far is that if you tilt your head just the wrong way, you accidentally redial your last phone call. We've experienced several "neck dials" - it may just be a matter of getting used to having it on your neck....we'll see. I'm not so sure about having the headset around my neck. It feels a bit awkward to me, but then, I'm not one for anything close around my neck (no turtlenecks, "choker" style necklaces, etc.). Again, it may just be a matter of getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: cjcshop

customer_reviews.title: EHHH...
customer_reviews.text: Microphone Blocking Reason Im giving this rating is because the microphone does not block out background noise. The caller on the other end can hear background noise and very distracting. I was thinking that this products microphone was designed to block out background noise for the microphone. Headphone Blocking The functionality that blocks out ambient noise for the headphones to block out ambient noise does not really work or possibly my samsung s5 is not compatible .
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Says Hi

customer_reviews.title: A few minor glitches but overall great headset.
customer_reviews.text: Have had some issues when I lean forward into seat belt. (double checking mirrors) Due to the position of the buttons on headset, it either (A. ends call. or (B. redials last number. Annoying but not a deal breaker. Great for listening to Audible books while on deliveries. UPDATE. 4/26/2016. Still going strong. Wish they were a bit louder. BT Reader download is flawed but great. It WILL repeat some texts but a small price to pay to have my texts read to me when behind the wheel. Great charge time. 4.7 stars? UPDATE: 10/25/2017. Still active but starting to have issues with on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Norrdeke

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.text: Sound: They sound fabulous when you have the ear buds in correctly. They actually sound better than most wired headphones to me and I am pretty picky. Range: I heard complaints about the range of these, but I just walked into an office down the hall probably 30 feet away through 4 walls and had no disruption in sound. I'm impressed. Value: While these were not the cheapest at around ninety bucks, I use them every day and will get my value out of them. Battery life: Lasts my whole work day and then some. Very nice. Durability: I can't speak to this as I have only had them a week.
customer_reviews.author: Keith & Allison

customer_reviews.title: Ear bud only works on one side after only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: a really cool electronic, I like them very much! Update on LG Electronics Tone Ultra (HBS-800). I have had these headphones for 6 months and noticed the speaker for the right ear has stopped working. At first I thought I was losing my hearing in one ear, thank God that was not the case! The speaker does not work anymore on the right side. For the money I paid I expect these to work better than this. I am going to have to contact the company and hopefully they can fix or send me another pair that works. I hate wasting my money on products that don't work as expected. I will keep everyone updated on the status.
customer_reviews.author: SheavonL

customer_reviews.title: Quality problems
customer_reviews.text: I love the features but poor quality. I previously purchased this same model from verizon last year and had to have it replaced twice because the sound quit and the earphones continued to produce heat after the power switch was turned off. Lithium batteries are dangerous and can create uncontrollable fire. The second time it was replaced by LG and that one was a keeper with no problems. I thought maybe newer units would have the problem resolved but I guess not. The unit I bought from amazon lasted less than a week before it had the same problems. Amazon did refund my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: freightdog

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace LG HBS 750 bluetooth headphones. These are a huge improvement. You can tell in the phone call quality, bass quality in audio. I havent noticed any benefit from the sound isolation and just leave it off to conserve battery life. Everyone i speak with on it remarks how well they can hear me, however if i am in a crowded area they can also hear everything else around me as well. overall 5/5. My last set broke after 2 weeks which is why i upgraded when i replaced them. I'm now 6 months in with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: ... older models of this headset and it worked just fine. But this one is crap
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the older models of this headset and it worked just fine. But this one is crap. After I purchased the LG HBS 800 it connected very easy but the mic would disconnect during my conversation. I went to the LG website and found out there were a lot of people having the same problem. LG has no clue why this is happening. I purchased another one from BestBuy and got the same problem. I tried turning off my wifi and it worked fine for a day then it started disconnecting again. There is a serious problem with the new models of this headset. Very nice design if only it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Williams Jr

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my father. He constantly complains that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father. He constantly complains that the range (distance you can be from the source) is very limited with his iPhone. He also says people have trouble hearing him (regardless of distance from source). I was surprised to hear this because, I have the cheaper version and I can be on a different floor in my house with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! If you enjoy choppy signal are nearly no range.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I'm glad I spent $100 on a headset that somewhat works. Don't get me wrong, sound quality is great. It connects easy. And very comfortable to use. But it fails immensely on the most important part: range. It's terrible. I can't put my phone in my pocket or work out in the gym without the signal getting scrambled or cutting up. I went back to using my regular wired earbuds because at least I can get consistent signal with them. My advice: save your money. This is a gimmick and complete garbage. I'm returning these and giving LG the finger for once again, failing at providing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gazaway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Quality Sound!!! Wires have a tendency to get hung up.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect in noisy conditions. I have absolutely no trouble hearing a caller. Great quality sound. Callers cannot tell when I am surrounded by noise, as they only hear complete clarity when I speak. The sound quality while listening to music is amazing! My only complaint: The wires have a tendency to get hung up once in awhile. One time, this issue caused my headset to jerk the wire too hard and since then, it occasionally cuts out. I'm very disappointed by this issue, as I've owned the headset only a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: tracy abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I made one phone call with this, then returned it. The other party couldn't hear me very well. With the noise cancellation on my voice was slightly muted and the first part of every sentence was cut off. With the noise cancellation turned off there was so much background noise (in the car on the highway) they couldn't hear anything I said. The earbuds don't stay in place on the main part of it - they're supposed to be held with magnets but they're not strong enough, so the earbuds are dangling all the time.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Stero Headset
customer_reviews.text: I received this but it wasn't packed good and appear to be used. The box states 2 sets of ear gel, user manual and warranty card was included in the box but they were not. The charger was in packaging that seem to have already been opened & used. The ear gels on the Bluetooth seem to have been used and the box it came in was worn, opened and no indication of new at all. I haven't used it yet because I'm thinking of sending it back. If I purchased a new item, I expect it to be new.....not used!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BooYa

customer_reviews.title: ... mine bought one in a big box store and loved it. I bought it for almost half the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because a friend of mine bought one in a big box store and loved it. I bought it for almost half the price and it was sent on time and in original packaging. The unit is light and easy to use, I was up and running in just a few minutes. It is so comfortable, that you might forget you have it on. Well worth the price! The sound quality is great and the multiple ear buds they send you can fit anyone even small ears. All in all, a great product for a great price. I would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Thalia

customer_reviews.title: I love this here baby I don't like talking on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this here baby I don't like talking on the phone without it. I can leave the phone on the charger in the bedroom and walk all over the less than 1500 sq ft home with lil to no interference. I love the clarity and sharpness, people actually complain when I don't use it that my voice is muffled. The battery charge is great, charges really fast holds charge all day practically. The mute is somewhat hard to operate. I really don't try to initiate calls from the phone much, at one time it read my texts to me as well, It stopped after I updated my sg5.
customer_reviews.author: selena69

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Bluetooth!
customer_reviews.text: For what these do, they do very well. They stay charged all day. The controls are simple to access by feel. I play music from my iPhone 5s and field calls, and send voice texts. No wires to tie me up. Ergonomics are excellent. The drivers are ok- but not amazing. But these are designed for functional use, not audiophiles. If they put some excellent drivers in these they'd be unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Dmarcot110

customer_reviews.title: I love the headset but I have returned several to you ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the headset but I have returned several to you for a couple of different reasons. The battery only lasts a few months and then they won't take a charge to get them started again. I have another pair that I bought in March and I cannot get them to charge. I see that the warranty is up on but I would like something to be done for my time and patience sending these headsets back to you and replacing them for another set. Please let me know what I can do to have my money refunded to me or have another pair delivered to me. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: all of which I found very useful, especially the active noise canceling is really
customer_reviews.text: I got it for 50$ and no tax and I think the price is more than reasonable. It has a lot of features, all of which I found very useful, especially the active noise canceling is really! With that on I could barely hear anything and focus on my work without worrying about being distracted by other people. I am a little concerned about gyming with it but I still think it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SDscientist

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this headset. LG messed up on this one.
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was great but this isn't the caliber of product that I expect from LG. I tried using it with my v10(LG) and it skips while my phone is in my pocket. That should let you know of its lack of range on this thing. I'm on my second one because not all of the controls worked on the first one. I should have gotten a clue right then to get the second. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Logan12

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy off brand again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I ordered this.... I gv my lg730 to my roommate and bought me a different brand Sneer which only lasted 2 months before it shorted out. I had to come bk to LG, there was no question about it..... The sound quality for music (my main purpose n having a bluetooth). The bass is rather nice compared to the 730...and the price was reasonable. I really wanted the hbs 900 infinim but refuse to pay 100 plus for a retractable headset. Good with this one...THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Alexus joe

customer_reviews.title: i don't like the time wasting voice prompts for connecting and battery ...
customer_reviews.text: long battery life, but not so long if using the noise reduction - which does work quite well though. volume, forward/back, power and noise reduction buttons are quite small and hard to find when wearing. i don't like the time wasting voice prompts for connecting and battery level. a quick beep would be preferred. but works well and i'm happy with it. the pairing with two devices works great. better would be if it told you which one has connected, rather than just saying "connected!".
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The LG Tone was great - in just about every way (but I lost ...
customer_reviews.text: The LG Tone was great - in just about every way (but I lost mine). the Tone Plus was a let down - might have sounded a bit better, but it kept disconnecting from the phone I was carrying - Bluetooth was not reliable - mostly reliable - but occasionally would pop in and out. So now the Tone Ultra - this one is less satisfying than either of the others... battery problems - the buttons are more complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Got to be counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd read the reviews. This replaced an identical one I lost, and it's definitely not the same. Has to be counterfeit, albeit a good-looking one. The voice announcing battery power etc. is different, sound is kind of muffled, and I don't even want to find out how bad range and battery life is. Returning immediately; so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica M.

customer_reviews.title: It worked for a while
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted. 40 days or so. Left channel now produces very fade sound, right still works great. Truth to be told i do run a lot and some wet damage is to be expected but my very similar LG headphone orders would usually last 6 months. All in all, if you plan on using these in a car or sitting down, you should be fun. If you plan on running while wearing them, find a similar cheaper product. These are not going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Vlatko Primorac

customer_reviews.title: Bought through amazon warehouse deals.... bad deal
customer_reviews.text: The hbs-800 is a very good headphone setup. Warehouse Deals is the reason for the 2 star rating. Advertised as "packaging damaged". The packaging was dirty as was the headphone, clearly had been well used. Was missing the extra earbud rubbers. The charging port is damaged and will just barely hold the cord. Very disappointed! Just to be clear, i lost my 1st hbs -800, bought this set as a replacement. The 800 works very well.
customer_reviews.author: RNAH

customer_reviews.title: I asked about her handsfree device cause she is so busy and can't talk sometimes cause flat smart phones don't rest on the shoul
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk, is it really an LG product? After wearing 5 times it stopped charging, my girlfriend put it in a drawer until she had a chance to address it and forgot about it. I asked about her handsfree device cause she is so busy and can't talk sometimes cause flat smart phones don't rest on the shoulder well...Now it's too late so I'm here telling the truth. We bought her niece the HBS750 and it as well stopped charging!! Avoid these products!!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Not moisture wicking
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product while running and working. Only used since June. The problem I face with this headset is that when I sweat the sound goes out (low volume/ static) and the headset won’t turn off. I have to wait for it to dry out to use them again but then the battery is dead from not turning off. I have used older lg (early model HBS) headsets and never had these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable you can forget to take them off before shower.
customer_reviews.text: These are so good, that I bought 3 of them... one for the daughter and two for the wife. Also found out that these are not water proof when wife decided to take a shower with these ones on (Suprise). On the bright side I can attest that these apparently are so comfortable to use, that you can forget they are even on when taking a shower...
customer_reviews.author: Tommi

customer_reviews.title: It's annoying, but keeps me from being a loud talker
customer_reviews.text: my only complaint is battery life. I talk on the phone a lot and the battery only lasts about 3 hours. Phone calls are clear, people can hear me clearly and I can hear them clearly. I did get the Comply T-500 Isolation Foam Earphone Tips, which may be overkill for just using the phone because I can hear myself speaking in my ears. It's annoying, but keeps me from being a loud talker! ;)
customer_reviews.author: RavenWolfe

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, just not perfect.... yet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this device but would offer a suggestion to make this a true five star device. Have retractable cables that can be "wound" so as to allow prevent the cables from getting tangled into the shoulder strap of my shoulder bag. A stronger magnet also wouldn't hurt as the buds do tend to pop out of the holders more than I would like. Still.... great product. :)
customer_reviews.author: David Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: These were a gift for my husband who drives a ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband who drives a 4 car tow truck. The Noise reduction was my seller. Most of the time I can hear him but sometimes all I hear is the truck. He says no one else has had an issue hearing him so maybe its my phone? Or is it that I talk to him more than others do? He uses them also to listen to Pandora when mowing or working on a car etc. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: After looking and reviewing multiple options, that is THE product. It fits so comfortably in your ear that you don't even feel it is there. Sound is excellent for the side talking and the one listening. Design is great and after some time you don't even feel it on your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B.

customer_reviews.title: Dirty headset
customer_reviews.text: Bought used "very good" condition. Needless to say, they were used alright. Set was dirty. Looks like it was used for months and later returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Lev

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is very comfortable, I wear mine almost all day
customer_reviews.text: For the price this really can't be beat. My issues are the fact that the ear buds don't stay attached very well, the magnets need to be a bit stronger. Otherwise it is very comfortable, I wear mine almost all day. The sound clarity is very good on my end. People on the other end report it sounding like you are on speakerphone.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not an Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is terrible. Bass is way too overpowering. The model HBS-730 is good and I am trying out the HBS-900 right now. Both of these are a better choice for sound quality. I also did not like the way that the ear buds tuck behind the plastic pieces. This made it very difficult to place them back after use. The only improvement I could see on these vs. the HBS-730 was the fact that the buttons are shaped for ease of use and there is not the huge flashing blue light on the top. Other than that, these were a real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Chylene

customer_reviews.title: Better than gear circle
customer_reviews.text: The volume is better for music and phone calls than the Samsung gear circle, which is a worthless device. Still, for playing music it is still not worth the effort. It has some difficulty capturing my voice as whoever is on the line repeatedly states that they can't hear me. Turning off the noise cancelling feature almost always remedies this. It is $27 cheaper than the gear circle and outperforms it by far. Buy it for the phone call features and forget playing music and you should be happy.
customer_reviews.author: William Manley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones 5 years ago and they are still great. The battery still last for at least 6 hours of use. The only issue I have ever had is one of the little clips that takes up the slack went missing. That's it. These get used every day, the standby time is Days still. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T.

customer_reviews.title: For the first 2 weeks this set work great but after works the right earphone start to fade ...
customer_reviews.text: For the first 2 weeks this set work great but after works the right earphone start to fade out and the sound went week and eventually died, while the left one still got this crisp clear sound, after a couple of weeks of enjoying only one working earphone it died too due to a loose wire inside, so I had to mess around with it to make it work. I bought this Bluetooth set on January and it died on April totaling 3 month of working life.
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I have own three of the lg headsets and this one by far is the worst. The title magnets that hold ear phones in a really weak and they constantly fall out . I've had it maybe two months and now it won't take a charge . I wouldn't reccomend this piticular model . Didn't have very good luck with it al all
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, when it works.
customer_reviews.text: When it works, I like it. First one wouldn't turn off after one month. I got the replacement which worked for about a year perfectly. Then it wouldn't turn on. So not so reliable or long lasting, but when it works, it's just what I want. So I ordered another. It connected to my iphone6s the first time. I received a call perfectly. Then, it disconnected and would never connect again. Just sent it back for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hint

customer_reviews.title: effective background noise reduction, good sound, needs heavier earbud cable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great stereo performance, comfortable to wear for hours, noise reduction works quite nicely Cons: too expensive, headphone cable too flimsy I was skeptical, but noise reduction works pretty darned good. To really test it out, you need to be in a very loud place (airport, airplane, big city, workzone, etc...) When you turn it on, the reduction of ambient noise is noticeable and appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best headset in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Just about waterproof. RELIABLE! JBL sound is awesome! I'm a delivery driver so I use these 40+ hours a week. Even, after getting beat up by boxes, drenched in rain and/or sweat, dust, extreme heat and cold, they turn on and run all day long without a hitch!
customer_reviews.author: Drake B.

customer_reviews.title: Best style, not as good as the old ones.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything it's supposed to be. LG just didn't seem to make this better than the first ones. The speakers aren't any better, maybe worse than my old pair. I've had these for a while now, and still not liking the button placement. Hopefully they make a better one. As far as bluetooth goes though, I wouldn't buy any other type. The things wrong with this set, it's still better than any other set.
customer_reviews.author: Ron J Yelenich

customer_reviews.title: Does not measure up to it's preceeding version (HBS-500)
customer_reviews.text: I have the earlier version of this headset (HBS-500). This version however seem flimsy by comparison. I could not get the connection to work beyond six feet. It seemed as though the bluetooth transmission was very week as it continuously alarmed that it was out of range. The controls for volume and advancing/scrolling were awkward to find and use. After the excellent experience I had with the previous version of this headset it sad to say that the second version did not improve upon it's predecessor even though it has several nice technological advancements.
customer_reviews.author: denc

customer_reviews.title: LG Electronics Tone Ultra (HBS-800) Bluetooth Stereo Headset
customer_reviews.text: The LG Electronics Tone Ultra (HBS-800) Bluetooth Stereo Headset is one the best investments I have made in a multi-functional headset. I enjoy the fact that I can work-out with them and they provide me with the quality of sound I look forward to hearing every time I wear them. Also they are excellent when I am reading a book online.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Issues with this model
customer_reviews.text: I've owned every version of the LG tones. I have really enjoyed all but this one. The noise cancellation feature shut down all noise including my music. Mine may have had a malfunction but it left a bad taste in my mouth. The other main issue is the size of the earbuds. The earbuds are longer than every other model. The two models before this one and the INFINIM all have a smaller earbud.
customer_reviews.author: Thirdbase

customer_reviews.title: nice headphones for a great prices
customer_reviews.text: um... the noise cancelling isn't perfect, but it significantly reduced the annoying presence of the engine noise on airplanes. Lasts 15 hours easy, and doesn't seem to lose juice over time. with it was just a little bit wider for my neck when lifting weights, but I can easily play basketball with this. Audio quality is at the top of bluetooth devices... with some skips here and there
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Voice mic stinks, noise cancelling is ok... go with 750 or 780 version.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you'd think the voice mic would be awesome. My friends and family can't understand me when I'm using this while driving and barely when sitting still. Otherwise the Noise Cancelling is -meh-. Not worth the additional expense. Go with the 750 version.
customer_reviews.author: TestsbySeth

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel
customer_reviews.text: I love LG, headsets. This one has great sound quality. But it lacks the ability to stay connected if I move more than 12 ft .away. I work. Sometimes I can't stay in the same place and can't take the time to pick the phone up. After 5 steps I here "trying to connect , out of range" That is bothersome. If this is a product specific malfunction maybe LG will send me a replacement. If it is the only way they could improve the 700 series, shame, shame, shame.
customer_reviews.author: r word

customer_reviews.title: My Bluetooth earphones seem to work pretty good. There is times it disconnects and Tries ...
customer_reviews.text: My Bluetooth earphones seem to work pretty good. There is times it disconnects and Tries to re-connect to my phone even though my phone is right near me. I am a little disappointed for in order to use it, I must stay real close to my phone. It doesn't have much of a range at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are the newer models. The original black models were better. I don't like how they changed the buttons. The layout is the same but it is harder to feel which ones you are pressing. Sometimes I have to remove it from around my neck to see where the button is. But the sound quality is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Dad's gift and he works in construction. Still work and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alondra.

customer_reviews.title: ... always needing to be on the phone- this tucks nicely under my collar and out of the way- Sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect- I am always needing to be on the phone- this tucks nicely under my collar and out of the way- Sound is perfect and buttons are located in spot easy to get to . Wish the magnets held the Ear bud better to the device- I work in a hospital so I don't use both when on the phone or listening to music...the other just flops. Not a negative at all and this is def worth the coin!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, LG
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this bluetooth headset. Now that it is after the return period (bought in October, 2015, now it is January, 2016), the headset randomly mutes and sound cuts off when connected to my computer. I originally thought the problem was when I had my phone connected with the bluetooth as well. However, even with a single connection, the headset still has a problem. Terrible, LG, shame on you.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is OK, but if you have the noise canceling on it runs down in about 4 hours. If I turn my head to one side I think there is a short in mine. I missed the return deadline of a month. Of course it starting happening 4 months in. I still use my old ones even though they had exposed wires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this set! And for the price, I'm beyond satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Try a Different Brand
customer_reviews.text: This is an update. I bought these back in October and now it is March 28. They just quit working today. They were nice while they lasted. I used them daily for 3-6hrs. I do not know if that is normal usage or not, but I would think that is about normal. Unfortunately, I now would not recommend this product due to quality issues. I do not think a product should only give you 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: These are okay in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Not all that thrilled with these but will keep them because they work ok. Sound quality and feel is poor compared to another LG Tune Pro I previously owned. Also the noise reduction is useless. Did not work with my LG G4 either. Constantly sputters on connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbounder

customer_reviews.title: Strike two so far...
customer_reviews.text: As a longtime, happy user of the HSB730 I was excited to see a new design come out from LG with the 800. Well the first one lasted a week and the second one lasted long enough for one use. I use these headsets while bicycling and I do sweat like crazy. It never bothered the 730 but maybe the 800 isn't as moisture resistant. Number three its on its way. Hopefully it won't strike out.
customer_reviews.author: CraigE

customer_reviews.title: Great device, poor magnetic holders ..
customer_reviews.text: This is one great device. The noise cancellation will never compare to that of a Bose, but it is better than most others I have tested. Connects to my phone without issues. The only negative point is that the magnets on the earplugs are not really strong enough, and fall out quite easily, and this result in me hunting for the earplug when receiving a call ....
customer_reviews.author: Rob M-D

customer_reviews.title: if you don't hear bass
customer_reviews.text: just got it after reading a lot of reviews btw it and the 730. i went ahead and got both so i could compare. i understand that the 730 may seem louder, it prob is, but just wanted to add that when using either, you have to make sure to push in the ear bud all the way into your ear, otherwise the bass will not sound right. these are very clear, i will add later after i use them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Millard

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it. haven't had any problem except for when you doing anything laying on the floor then it will flop off your neck so I tucked the wings under sport bra strap and it works. Work good in the car too
customer_reviews.author: K.N Minnesota.

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great with the headphones. It hasn’t even been a year yet and they crapped out. They just stop working I tried charging them and nothing. Incredible that these headphones didn’t last because I really like them. Horrible durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: OK, but I prefer the 730's.
customer_reviews.text: These are good, but I have the 730's and actually prefer them. They are used, so take that for what you will. The 730's have a better earbud design, longer more flexable cord and better sound quality. The do seem to be better construction and more durable than the 730's, but for now I'll stick with the old ones. My son loves them though.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Lastly voice recognition is disappointingly bad. Now the only positive is that honestly the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made not worth the money the less expensive version is much louder. Though the bass is decent the high send a crackling noise through the headphones the make them seem blown. Lastly voice recognition is disappointingly bad. Now the only positive is that honestly the battery is good and charging is easy, but if broken (as mine did in less than 90days) expect a horrible experience to get it replaced by anyone other than Amazon will never buy these again also I deeply recommend against it
customer_reviews.author: Binion of Detroit MI

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a couple of years. They performed well but the ON/OFF switch went bad. They worked fine until then.
customer_reviews.author: BamaJD1

customer_reviews.title: Use only in dry areas
customer_reviews.text: I was in hot tub. The steam slowly stopped the headset from functioning . When out it worked again. VERY SENSITIVE to miosture. Get it wet, its done.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT KING

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for the last three months, but all of the sudden I no longer have audio from the left ear bud. No sign of trouble or abnormal usage. Yesterday it worked; today it doesn't. When it did work, it was not as comfortable or easy to operate as the LG Tone HBS-730 model. The noise cancelling seemed to work well enough. I am just so disappointed that after a few months it's basically garbage. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as wired
customer_reviews.text: Nice for use on airplane - only downside is everything else it's been Bluetooth connected to must be turned off in order for device to connect. I also have wired noise canceling for flying but the wires get in the way so I decided to try these. Noise canceling isn't as good as wired, but not real surprised. Good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tramper

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds are clear, bass is deep and will have your head shaking. You here low tones you normally wouldn't hear. The controls are simple. Has noise canceling tech. Only thing I hate is the stupid voice. Tells you when you're connected, answered and disconnected a call. Battery level. She's just annoying. Other than that, these head phones are flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Xzavier Aleister Carsten

customer_reviews.title: Great but consider the 730 first
customer_reviews.text: I had the 700 model before this and finally had to replace it after I lost it. The 800 model has also been fantastic, but I am not sure if it justifies the price difference over the 730. That being said, this is still a great set of headphones. Great quality music and crystal clear calls. Can't go wrong with it, but you may be better off getting the 730 model for the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: GA Consumer

customer_reviews.title: We're out of box when received
customer_reviews.text: I love this particular model and have had about 5 pairs. Its the sound thats great, but this pair crackles and the power button is flaky. So not as happy with this pair. Also the was some discoloration present on one side so should have known it might be compromised. What would satisfy would jut be to send me another working set and i will return the one i have. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of LG Tone Headsets for a number of years, this is my third pair and this pair is by far the worst. the earpods don't stay in their magnetic holders and the sound is not great at all.
customer_reviews.author: Margo L

customer_reviews.title: Great hands free device
customer_reviews.text: I love this hands free. This hands-free works great for listening to podcasts as well as answering my phone. The earbuds do not hurt my ears and the voice commands are accurately responsive.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: second time now i have bought an LG tone product ...
customer_reviews.text: second time now i have bought an LG tone product and both times they have stopped working in under a year. first time the ear bud broke in half and figured that maybe i didnt handle them carefully enough so i bought the newer model and all worked well until a few days ago when the bluetooth stopped connecting and then they wouldnt turn on at all. i do not treat them roughly whatsoever so im not sure what caused it this time but i am going to look into a different brand for my next headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: might be good for a noisy environment.
customer_reviews.text: First one already broke after 2 weeks. Amazon got out this one now and it so far so good, one week. plus is it does have some noise canceling, callers can hear me ok in noisy environment, and sound is very good. Bad , I have Lg L90. and the equalizer is useless. it seems a bit on the low quality manufacture.. i hope it does not break after Amazon warranty, Lg warranty sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the tech savvy
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for. I thought I killed at a family picnic when it rained but it still works great. I use the ANC feature when I'm sleeping during the day and day noises are happening outside, and it works fine to me. I think I accidentally cover the microphone sometimes with my clothes so I'm muffled to whomever im speaking with, but that's user error, not the device. I love this addition to my tech collection. Oh, also I've synced it with my iPhone, Surface Pro 2, and a basic flip phone that I use at work. The controls on the headset have worked with every device I've paired it with.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a device that would allow me to make long phone conversations without causing me headaches or falling off my ear. Headband type headsets compressed my jaw and caused headaches. Over-the-ear styles interfered with my eyeglasses, and other earbuds fell out when I moved around while on the phone and constantly got tangled with the long cords. I'm very pleased with the Tone.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted to let everyone know, how satisfied I am. I work 10 hour shifts. Love to listen to music. This headset is the first one only to last my 10 hour shift playing music all day answered a few calls. When I was ready to go home I checked the battery on it from my IPhone, and it said 60% percent. Doesn't get any better than that! Thank you LG.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not good for working out
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for about 6 months then it died. I used it while working out, so I assume the sweat from workout killed it. I would not purchase again if used for workout. But if used as everyday earpiece, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Quality products, Customer for life
customer_reviews.text: I've owned LG Tones since the beginning with the very first model. I like these so much I bought my wife and daughter a pair. As long as LG keep making quality Tones they have a customer for life with me.
customer_reviews.author: STAY LOW

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. Used it for two weeks and can't stand them. I went back to using wired headphones. Keeps cutting in and out while using my IPhone 4s and 5s. Mostly listen to music. Phone calls I can hear other party well but they can't hear me. Sounds like I am listening to a scratched cd for music play, and phone is just a few feet away from headset in my pocket. Sound quality is ok if you can get the buds to stick in your ear all the way. Not happy and can't believe so many people are ok with a crappy product. Wow!! I may try Bluetooth again if they make some serious improvements.
customer_reviews.author: kyle angelocci

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, looks and sounds good
customer_reviews.text: I got this after reading a lot of reviews online and asking people that have a pair how they like them. Each person I asked loved them so I went for it. Very glad I did, sound is great on my end and on the other end. Suggestion, if you only use one earbud when on the phone, remove the other from it's magnetic hold and let it hang down or put it behind your shoulder, otherwise the person on the other end of the call may hear an echo because the earbud is basically next to the mic.
customer_reviews.author: KLB

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just not for long
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this product. I use it everyday, the sound is great, the range is good, it has been useful to me on a daily basis. I give it a 2 star because after 6 months one side stopped working without warning. It's pretty disappointing to have a product that is so useful to simply stop working after 6 months of use. It doesn't come with a warranty so it looks like i'm stuck. Buy this prouduct with caution as this is the second one I've bought already with the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ben Herrera

customer_reviews.title: I like this bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this bluetooth headset. The biggest annoyance is the very loud "beep" when changing volume. I end up reaching for the phone to change volume instead of being blasted with the beep. This somewhat defeats the purpose of "hands free". Sound quality of music and phone calls is good. I like the ANC automatic noise reduction, which noticeably reduces some background noises. Battery duration is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Drenth

customer_reviews.title: When I got them in great condition. They are the best and come in ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got them in great condition. They are the best and come in handy when I need my hands free for everyday tasks. The white is the best, when I don't want to talk to anyone, all they have to do is see the white earbud and no one bothers me. The sound is great, the buttons are easy to control and the set up for the Bluetooth is easy. I recommend these to whoever wants to get them. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great sound but totally poor design on every other point
customer_reviews.text: others cant make out my words when I talk, the magnets holding the earbuds are so weak that the buds are never held in place, the wires to the buds are a bit too short for comfort, and the necklace is far too loose, such that it falls all the time. The sound however is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: AlchemistOfLife

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Loud enough, easy to use, and even though my neck is too thick for the other behind-the-neck headsets, these are worthy due to how the ear pieces maneuver instead of stuck in a fixed position. Battery life is no problem so far...good choice for me...maybe you too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Clark

product_meta.title: LG Electronics Tone Ultra (HBS-800) Bluetooth Stereo Headset - Retail Packaging - White
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

 PREMIUM SOUND EXCEPTIONAL DESIGN 
 LG Tone Ultra features JBL Signature Sound that provides a premium sound experience and Ambient Noise Cancellation (ANC) that cancels background sounds for an optimal acoustic experience, whether you’re listening to music while in flight, shopping in the mall, or enjoying time with your kids at the amusement park, you can take your calls knowing that the Tone Ultra will deliver your voice clearly. Superior music and voice quality. Award-winning, premium, comfortable, and intuitive design. It’s all at your fingertips with LG Tone Ultra. 

 A TOP-RATE AUDIO EXPERIENCE 
 With enhanced bass response and features such as HD Voice and aptX, you’ll experience full, rich, authentic sound for your music and crystal-clear voice calls. 

 AWARD-WINNING AND PREMIUM DESIGN 
 We know fashion matters to you. Tone Ultra is a winner of two awards for outstanding design! 

 AROUND-THE-NECK WEARING STYLE WITH BODY-CONTOURED FIT 
 It provides a comfortable, curved fit. It’s light as well as powerful, with long talk and music play times, and provides a natural feel through all-day wear and use. 

 GOOGLE VOICE ACTIONS 
 Use Google Voice Actions and your compatible phone to look up a friend, check the weather, or get updates on the big game - all with simple voice commands. 

 MORE THAN MUSIC 
 Tone Ultra is great for listening to your favorite music while working out, shopping, or doing errands. Stay connected with friends, family, and work - no matter where your day takes you. 

View larger
feature_bullets: JBL Signature Sound provides a premium sound experience
Ambient Noise Cancellation cancels background sounds for an optimal acoustic experience
Google Voice Actions Integration - look up a friend, check the weather, or get updates on the big game - all with simple voice commands
Award-Winning, Premium, and Ergonomic Design - designed for quick, easy access to music and call controls and all-day wear

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars2,459 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 1-Lithium Ion Battery, Usb Included, Lg Electronics Tone Ultra
